item.title: Feedback
item.description: Please feel free to leave any type of anonymous feedback on my presentation at the following link: https://forms.gle/pfkhxdRzEE7ETmcs8

item.title: News
item.description: [Dec 8, 2023] I have joined the group of Mattias Rantalainen at Karolinska Institutet as a postdoc to work on computational pathology. [Nov 30, 2023] I have successfully defended my PhD thesis Towards Accurate and Reliable Deep Regression Models [pdf] [DiVA] [slides]. [Oct 2, 2023] New preprint: Controlling Vision-Language Models for Universal Image Restoration [arXiv] [code] [project]. [Jun 28, 2023] Accepted paper: How Reliable is Your Regression Model’s Uncertainty Under Real-World Distribution Shifts?
